patthana15.49:4.1: Ajjhattikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:4.2: Bāhiraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:4.3: Ajjhattikaṃ kusalañca bāhiraṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:5.1: Ajjhattikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:5.2: Bāhiraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.49:5.3: Ajjhattikaṃ akusalañca bāhiraṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
